committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Compensation and Employee Benefits

official_title: Expressing the sense of Congress that all employers, in both the public and private sectors, should follow the example set by the city of Chicago in adopting employment policies to assure the continuity of salaries, wages, and other benefits for employees called to active military service as part of Operation Desert Storm.

summary.text: Calls on all employers, public and private, to follow the example of the city of Chicago and adopt and implement employment policies to assure the continuity of salaries, wages, and other benefits of employees called to active military service as part of Operation Desert Storm.

titles.title: Expressing the sense of Congress that all employers, in both the public and private sectors, should follow the example set by the city of Chicago in adopting employment policies to assure the continuity of salaries, wages, and other benefits for employees called to active military service as part of Operation Desert Storm.
